name: MyColorscreen
tag_list: mobile, device, share, social, screen, homescreen, home, android, iphone
overview:
MyColorscreen is a social-driven platform for users to share their devices home screens. Share great apps, wallpapers, themes, and customization with other designers, and developers.

What Is MyColorscreen?

MyColorscreen is a social network site for mobile device enthusiasts, designers, developers and other creatives that allow the users to share the screenshot of your home screens/apps from your favorite mobile devices and share the world your fabulous work through our simple and elegant designed platform.

You will be able to socialize with fellow creative minds and start a discussion around the screen captured on their devices such as asking for opinion for the UI design of your upcoming iPhone app, or showing off your hand-designed layout of your Android devices.

MyColorscreen also allows you to create a network of your favorite creative minds. By following them, you will get their updates instantly keeping you up to date of their work.

Why Use MyColorscreen?

MyColorscreen is more than just a social network platform, or generic art community. We focus on your devices and provide tools for you to give your device a personalized page of their own.
